text: Vyacheslav Igorevich Voinarovskiy (8 February 1946 - 24 September 2020) was a Russian opera singer and actor. He was born in Khabarovsk, Soviet Union. He was known for his roles in The Garage (1980), To Kill a Dragon (1989) and in Mother (1990). In 1999, he was honored as a People's Artist of Russia. Voynarovskii died on 24 September 2020 from a long-illness in Moscow, aged 74.Умер оперный певец Вячеслав Войнаровский ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian singers Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian voice actors Category:Khabarovsk Krai
title: Vyacheslav Voynarovskii
